overview_of_class: This course simulates how teams can and should work together and how teams make decisions in "the real world." Ideally, success in this class will help students succeed in other team settings on campus and elsewhere. Theories and research relating to the various processes by which leaders make decisions, affect group behavior, and engage groups in a variety of task- and strategy-related outcomes is covered, and group communication is stressed, with a particular emphasis on change and conflict.
name: Team Leadership and Decision Making
subject: COMM_ST
